summary: Fix scroll of conjure atronach bug with Elemental Potency perk
descriptionHtml:
Scroll of Conjure Flame / Frost / Storm Atronach seems not to work at all when the player has Elemental Potency perk.

This simple esp fixes the bug; when you have Elemental Potency perk, you will actually conjure potent atronach now.



My other mod :

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31102/?]Unique Unique - Artifact Enchantment Overhaul[/url]:
UNIQUE artifacts should be really UNIQUE! Sick of blend enchantments on your artifacts? This is the mod.
author: hidconsp
